syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Economics

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Relationship between countries at different levels of development

learning_objectives.description: international aid: forms of aid, reasons for giving aid, effects of aid, importance of aid
role of multinational companies (MNCs): definition of MNC, activities of MNCs, consequences of MNCs
Foreign Direct Investment (FDI): definition of FDI, consequences of FDI
external debt: causes of debt, consequences of debt
role of the International Monetary Fund (IMF)
